page.title: 20FOSTON VILLAGE.
page.content: There is not very much in{Foston village like there is in Sudbury. There is only a small{Post-Office,a {garage}and{a saddlery. { }There is a busy road going through the middle of the village. If you were on the side of the garage and wanted to get to the Post-Office it would be difficult to cross. The road is the{A50}from Burton to Stoke-on- Trent. On the outskirts are a number of farms. { { {Domesday Project work by: }Caroline Latham, Helen Wild,Julie Townsend, Sarah Wheeler, David Hudson,Lee Stanfield,Sarah Bull, Claire Chetwynd, Claire Salt,James Walker,Mark Kent, Effie Burns,Julie Ede,Rebecca Brake Sarah Dickenson and Jane Powell.
